thread.title: Viola Davis Won’t Dignify a Trump Question By Talking About Him
thread.title_full: Viola Davis Won’t Dignify a Trump Question By Talking About Him

author: E. Alex Jung
title: Viola Davis Won’t Dignify a Trump Question By Talking About Him
text: As you would come to expect from Viola Davis, she is a poised and masterful speaker both onstage and backstage. After delivering a touching acceptance speech at the Golden Globes for her work in Fences , Viola Davis answered reporters’ questions backstage, one of which inevitably was about the incoming U.S.... More »
